data.name: Paint Warfare - Distinguished Dino Attire
data.detailed_description:
Protects from UV rays, made from high quality fabric

Includes:
  • Some cool dino attire to for your next Paint Warfare game
  • The 'Hot Headed' hat which you can equip to be the absolute hottest bean in the lobby ;)
data.about_the_game:
Protects from UV rays, made from high quality fabric

Includes:
  • Some cool dino attire to for your next Paint Warfare game
  • The 'Hot Headed' hat which you can equip to be the absolute hottest bean in the lobby ;)
data.short_description: A very divine looking dino outfit + the 'Hot Headed' hat which you can equip to be the absolute hottest bean in the lobby ;)
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, French, German, Dutch, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest OS X
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu, SteamOS
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
